title: "Unable to connect to the login queue"

replies.body: I've got a [**sticky post**](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/hF8EV88W-were-unable-to-log-you-in-because-you-may-be-offline) up going over some of the steps that have been able to help for a good number of players. I've got another trick up my sleeve, but I'd like for our tech guys to walk you through those steps since it can be a little tricky.
That didnt work for me. Let me know about the other fix.
Hit up our tech guys in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and they'll be able to walk you through those steps! ^_^
I'm having the same problem. Any news on a fix?
Just had an alert up... but now it's gone
